problem.markdown:
Which of the following are the characteristics of any reversible process?
[x] It is a quasi static process. [ ] It may involve some one-way mode of work. [ ] It is an adiabatic process. [ ] Heat transfer to the system may take place from another system which is at a different temperature [explanation] B and D prevent reversibility, C is not necessary. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are the characteristics of any reversible process?

checkboxgroup.choice: It is a quasi static process.
It may involve some one-way mode of work.
Heat transfer to the system may take place from another system which is at a different temperature

div.p: B and D prevent reversibility, C is not necessary.
